::: {.blurb}
[TIDYMODELS]{.tagline}

The tidymodels framework is a collection of packages for modeling and machine learning using [tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/) principles.

Install tidymodels with:

```r
install.packages("tidymodels")
```
:::
